title: Inconsistencies with federal laws
context: ยง481C-5 Inconsistencies with federal laws. No contract shall be required by this chapter to contain provisions which are directly inconsistent with the federal laws relating to door-to-door sales. A provision under this chapter is not directly inconsistent with the federal laws relating to door-to-door sales, if it provides greater protection to the consumer. [L 1976, c 32, pt of ยง5]
